sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO t_notice ( row_id, to_people, cc_people, title, content, html_content, station, email, sms, create_time ) VALUES ( #rowId#, #toPeople#, #ccPeople#, #title#, #content#, #htmlContent#, #station#, #email#, #sms#, sysdate() )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE t_notice SET row_id = #rowId#
station = station + 1
email = email + 1
sms = sms + 1
WHERE row_id = #rowId#

UPDATE t_notice SET row_id = #rowId#
station = -1
email = -1
sms = -1
WHERE row_id = #rowId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT row_id as rowId, to_people as toPeople, cc_people as ccPeople, title, content, html_content as htmlContent, station, email, sms FROM t_notice WHERE create_time > date_sub(now(), interval 8 day)
station >= 0 and station <= 3
email >= 0 and email <= 3
sms >= 0 and sms <= 3
ORDER BY create_time limit 0,50
